onyomiExamples.meaning: heat, fever, temperature, zeal, passion, enthusiasm, mania, craze, rage
generation of heat, (attack of) fever, pyrexia
lowering a fever, alleviation of fever

kunyomiExamples.meaning: hot (thing), passionate (feelings, etc.), ardent, hot (e.g. gaze), hot (e.g. temper), zealous, enthusiastic, fired up, intense, severe, extreme, hot (topic), of interest

kunyomiExamples.reading: あついあんこくぶっしつ
